Currently 4.45/5 1 2 3 4 5
4.5 /5 (220 votes) Loading... Following the meal or no meal rules, discover this restaurant and get as many points as you can!
Welcome to Andre’s restaurant - the only place where you can bargain for your dinner...there is not a set price - great huh?! First choose the tray of food that you want to have. Once you’ve done that, pick six of the 25 trays that are left - then you’ll hear the chef’s dinner bell! He’ll make you an offer now, of how much he thinks you should pay. You can accept his offer and the round is finished. but if you think it’s too expensive, you can refuse his offer and carry on by selecting another 5 trays. The chef will then make you another offer and you can accept or reject it...and the game continues just like that! If you want to accept his offer, click on "meal". If you want to reject it and continue playing, click on "no meal"! Easy!
You’ve got to think carefully because if you pay too much for your meal you might lose the game. only pay the amount of money that you think is the lowest that he will offer you! This girls game is so much fun, and you really need to think hard about what to do - your brain will be buzzing afterwards. This free game is just for girls, but don’t forget to show all your friends what a great score you got, and pass on the website to them so that they can try too!
